title: Mobile Microlearning for Enhancing Dementia Understanding and Caregiving Competencies

context.additional_context: A mobile-based short-term training course for office/administrative professionals, focusing on dementia basics and daily life support methods.

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish characteristics of dementia symptom stages (early/middle/late) with 80% or higher accuracy
Apply effective communication techniques (3 or more) with dementia patients to real-world cases
Investigate three types of community-based dementia support services and incorporate findings into group project reports
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
